RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
Some light snacks & refreshments will be provided. To help keep the cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up.

Time: 7 - 9 pm

Parking:
Free parking with no sticker or pass required is available across the street on Fresh Pond LANE. Park on that street, then cross the parkway carefully to my home at 87 Fresh Pond Parkway, a brick house with decks and yellow trim.
*********************************************
Shannon Brophy and Susan Conley, BostonLOA members and "Abraham" enthusiasts, look forward to facilitating our discussion re: Abraham Hicks. Come to share, have fun, raise vibration and focus "downstream" to a more joyful, fulfilling life!

To get acquainted, we will do an exercise in which each person introduces themselves, shares about 2-3 minutes with the group one of the Abraham-Hicks processes that has helped them to turn downstream and focus positively on what they want and has helped reduce/eliminate resistance.

We will listen to some dialogues from an Abraham-Hicks workshop, and then have a group discussion.

We will learn about the Emotional Guidance Scale and how to use it to feel better. Learn how to use this process to reduce resistance on an issue where you're feeling "stuck" or feel like you’re not moving forward so that you may get into your Vibrational Escrow.

We will share an example of how to choose better thoughts and work yourself up the Emotional Guidance Scale. If a thought feels better, it is. If a thought feels worse, discard it and try again for a better feeling thought. As Abraham says as a basis, there are two emotions: "better" and "worse."

First we'll hear Abraham do it, we will do it with one person in the group as a way to see it in action. Then we will do it on our own on paper and if there is time, discuss it with another.

We will be molding the clay here and having fun with our individual desires……as Abraham says, "We are always evolving so you never get it wrong because you never get it done!"

***************************************************************
Shannon Brophy
